name: 網球（一）
comment: 本課程為【FPU0164 網球（二）】先修科目
description:
A course descriptions, training feelings


  Two batting rhythm master - Mini Tennis


  Three  control and hit back - forehand groundstroke


  Four  control and hit back - backhand groundstroke


  Five angle (straight, diagonal) control and hit  - forehand groundstroke


  Six angle (straight, diagonal) control and hit - backhand groundstroke


  Seven mid-term exam


  Eight  film appreciation and explain the rules (rain preparation day)


  Nine serve & volley (I), a combination of exercise


  Ten serve & volley (II), a combination of exercise


  Eleven opponents hit when the Internet strategy and technology - wheeling Jizhui and Lob


 twelve  singles matches (rules)


Thirteen singles practice game (game strategy)


Fourteen singles match


Fifteen singles match


Sixteen technical test


Seventeen technical test


Eighteen final exam
goals: 加強各項網球基本知識及應用技術
瞭解網球規則及網球歷史發展基本知識
享受參與網球運動之樂趣及發展性。
瞭解網球運動之特性，並運用相關學科來熟練單雙打比賽 之練習。
syllabus:
**Class Schedule****（****tentative, 16** **）****:**

**W1 Course description , Rules , Ball feeling**  

**W2 Mini Tennis , Feeding**   

**W3 Forehand Groundstroke** 

**W4 Backhand Groundstroke** 

**W5 Different rhythm groundstroke** 

**W6 Volley & Smash** 

**W7 Toss & Serve swing**  

**W8 Serve** 

**W9 Hit the wall practice** 

**W10 Groundstroke rally without net** 

**W11 Matches rules** 

**W12 Doubles drilles (devil game)**

**W13 Doubles matches** 

**W14 Doubles matches**

**W15 Findal exam** 

**W16 Singles matches**

methodologies.note: tennis can't hit by yourself always group in course :hit , feed , pick , look
